title: Elon Musk’s Grok appears to modify image generation after outcry
description: By Hadas Gold, CNN (CNN) — Elon Musk’s Grok artificial intelligence chatbot appears to have new guardrails around image generation, following global outrage after it was found to be complying with user requests to digitally undress images of adults and in some cases children. title: Newsom calls to 'hold xAI accountable' for explicit deepfakes
description: Gov. Gavin Newsom called for an “investigation” into Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence app Grok over creating fake pornographic content.
content:

description:

title: U.S. allows Nvidia to send advanced AI chips to China with restrictions
description: The U.S. Commerce Department has opened the door for Nvidia to sell advanced artificial intelligence chips in China with restrictions, following through on a policy shift announced last month by President Donald Trump. The change would permit Nvidia to sell its powerful H200 chip to Chinese buyers if certain conditions…

title: White House continues its push to advance AI action plan as Congress mulls regulations
description: Lawmakers debating how to regulate the artificial intelligence industry are pushing the White House for answers on its vision to push its plan forward.

title: Elon Musk's Grok to be investigated in California
description: California’s governor and attorney general said on Wednesday that they were demanding answers from Elon Musk’s xAI after the billionaire said he was not aware of any “naked underage images” generated by its artificial intelligence chatbot, called Grok.

title: US Sets 25% Tariff on Some Chip Sales as Part of Nvidia Deal
description: The US imposed a 25% tariff on imports of certain semiconductors, a key step in an agreement blessed by President Donald Trump allowing Nvidia Corp. to ship Taiwan-made H200 artificial intelligence processors to China.
content:
